TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl

summary.span: 在網頁上顯示廣告橫幅。

span.span: Displays an advertisement banner on a Web page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [XML 廣告檔格式XML Advertisement File Format](#XMLAdvertisementFileFormat) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項在網頁上顯示隨機選取的廣告橫幅。Use the control to display a randomly selected advertisement banner on the Web page. 每當重新整理頁面時，就會變更顯示的廣告。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page refreshes. 公告資訊儲存在個別的 XML 檔案。Advertisement information is stored in a separate XML file. XML 檔案可讓您維護的公告及關聯的屬性清單。The XML file allows you to maintain a list of advertisements and their associated attributes. 屬性包含要顯示，請按一下控制項時，要顯示的映像無法使用時的替代文字、 關鍵字和廣告的頻率時連結至 URL 之影像的路徑。Attributes include the path to an image to display, the URL to link to when the control is clicked, the alternate text to display when the image is not available, a keyword, and the frequency of the advertisement. 此檔案中的資訊不會驗證控制項。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 廣告可以防止執行惡意指令碼，您應該一律釋放，之前，先檢查資料，或接受來自信任來源的廣告資訊。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保護您免於未經授權的網際網路存取的通告檔案，執行一或多個項目：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 請將它儲存在 App_Data 目錄中，設定為拒絕存取網際網路的任何類型的檔案。Store it in the App_Data directory, which is configured to deny Internet access for files of any type. - 重新命名此檔案不是.xml 副檔名，並將對應至延伸模組`HttpForbiddenHandler`Web.config 中。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Machine.config 檔案中的區段。Rename the file with an extension that is not .xml, and map the extension to the `HttpForbiddenHandler` in Web.config. For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. 為 XML 檔案做為資料來源的替代方案，就可以提供透過回呼事件的廣告資訊。As an alternative to an XML file as the source of data, it is possible to provide advertisement information through a callback event. 此事件也可用在組合中 XML 檔案的行為延伸控制項，例如重新導向至另一個頁面。This event can also be used in combination with the XML file to extend the behavior of the control, such as redirecting to another page. 請參閱屬性上的檔案格式的其他資訊。See the property for additional information on the file format. > [!NOTE] > 頁面快取啟用時，控制項不會快取。When page caching is enabled, an control is not cached. 每當重新整理網頁時，會選取新的廣告。A new advertisement is selected whenever the Web page refreshes. 新的廣告未選取，不過，如果您提供的事件處理常式事件。A new advertisement is not selected, however, if you provide an event handler for the event. ## XML 廣告檔格式XML Advertisement File Format 控制項使用不同的 XML 廣告檔來儲存的廣告資訊，例如要顯示之影像的位置和連結至頁面的 URL。The control uses a separate XML advertisement file to store the advertisement information, such as the location of the image to display and the URL of the page to link to. 屬性控制項指定這個檔案的路徑。The property of the control specifies the path to this file. 建立通知檔案時，開啟和關閉``標記標示開始和結束的檔案，分別。When creating the advertisement file, opening and closing `` tags mark the beginning and the end of the file, respectively. 開啟和關閉``標記分隔每個廣告。Opening and closing `` tags delimit each advertisement. 所有公告巢都狀的開頭和結尾之間``標記。All advertisements are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 如果檔案包含多個``標記，只有第一組``檔案中的標記會由剖析控制項。If the file contains multiple `` tags, only the first set of `` tags in the file will be parsed by the control. 所有其他``標記將會被忽略。All other `` tags will be ignored. 每個公告的資料項目巢狀的開頭和結尾之間``標記。The data elements for each advertisement are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 雖然預先定義的特定資料元素 (例如並)，您可以將自訂項目之間``標記。Although certain data elements are predefined (such as and ), you can place custom elements between the `` tags. 這些項目可由控制它會剖析該檔案。These elements will be read by the control when it parses the file. 資訊會傳遞至中的事件字典屬性。The information is then passed to the event in the dictionary property. 下表列出預先定義的 XML 廣告檔的資料元素。The following table lists the data elements that are predefined for the XML advertisement file. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|影像檔 （選擇性） 絕對或相對 URL。The absolute or relative URL to an image file (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|如果使用者按一下廣告 （選擇性） 連結至頁面的 URL。The URL of a page to link to if the user clicks the ad (optional). **注意：** 如果未設定這個項目，`HRef`屬性不會呈現錨點標籤上。**Note:** If this element is not set, the `HRef` property is not rendered on the anchor tag.| |`Height`|映像，單位為像素 （選擇性） 的高度。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|映像，單位為像素 （選擇性） 的寬度。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`AlternateText`|取代映像時指定之影像的文字顯示便無法使用屬性 （選擇性）。The text display in place of the image when the image specified by the property is not available (optional).

在某些瀏覽器中，這段文字也會顯示為`ToolTip`廣告。In some browsers, this text also appears as a `ToolTip` for the advertisement.| |`Keyword`|分類廣告 （比方說，「 電腦 」），您可以篩選依據 （選用）。A category for the advertisement (for example, "computers") that you can filter by (optional).| |`Impressions`|表示相對於其他廣告 （選擇性） 檔案中的循環的排程廣告的重要性的數字。A number that indicates the importance of the ad in the schedule of rotation relative to the other ads in the file (optional).

較大的數字，越常顯示廣告。The larger the number, the more often the ad is displayed. 所有總計``XML 檔案中的值不能超過 2,047,999,999 *。*The total of all `` values in the XML file cannot exceed 2,047,999,999 *.* 若是如此，控制項會擲回執行階段例外狀況。If it does, the control throws a run-time exception.| 下列範例顯示 XML 廣告檔的格式。The following example shows the format for the XML advertisement file. ``` URL of image to display for Advertisement #1 URL of page to link to for Advertisement #1 Text to show as a ToolTip for Advertisement #1 Keyword used to filter for Advertisement #1 Relative importance of Advertisement #1 Custom Data about Advertisement #1 ``` ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項在網頁上顯示廣告橫幅。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to display an advertisement banner on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範 XML 檔案，其中包含上一個範例的廣告資訊的檔案格式。The following code example demonstrates the file format for an XML file that contains advertisement information for the previous example. 如需有關檔案格式的詳細資訊，請參閱成員。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 ```

related.span: AdRotator Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: AdRotator Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 新控制項接著會新增至的集合控制項，並顯示在 Web Form 網頁上。The new control is then added to the collection of a control and displayed on the Web Forms page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[AdRotatorCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdRotatorCtor/CS/adrotatorctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdRotatorCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdRotatorCtor/VB/adrotatorctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AdCreated As AdCreatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在控制項建立之後，但在網頁呈現之前，每來回伺服器一趟即發生一次。

span.span: Occurs once per round trip to the server after the creation of the control, but before the page is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉譯每次來回行程之後建立的控制項，但會在頁面之前的伺服器之後，就會引發這個事件。This event is raised once per round trip to the server after the creation of the control, but before the page is rendered. 當設定屬性時，就會發生此事件後已從檔案選取廣告。When the property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file. 您可以控制如何藉由修改傳遞至事件處理常式的引數顯示控制項事件。You can control how the control is displayed by modifying the arguments passed to the event handler of the event. 如果未設定屬性，這可讓您的廣告資訊直接指定，而不使用個別的公告檔案。If the property is not set, this allows you to specify the advertisement information directly, without using a separate advertisement file. 如果屬性設定，這可讓您擴充的行為控制項，例如重新導向至另一個頁面。If the property is set, this allows you to extend the behavior of the control, such as redirecting to another page. > [!NOTE] > 頁面快取啟用時，控制項不會快取。When page caching is enabled, an control is not cached. 每當重新整理網頁時，會選取新的廣告。A new advertisement is selected whenever the Web page refreshes. 新的廣告未選取，不過，如果您提供的事件處理常式事件。A new advertisement is not selected, however, if you provide an event handler for the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取得與公告相關聯的 URL 時控制項建立時，並將它顯示在控制項下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement, when the control is created, and displays it below the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔案的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information on the XML file, see the property. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AdvertisementFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AdvertisementFile : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an XML file that contains advertisement information.

value.span: 包含廣告資訊的 XML 檔的位置。

span.span: The location of an XML file containing advertisement information.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定包含廣告資訊的 XML 檔案的位置。Use the property to specify the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. XML 檔案必須位於相同的網站。The XML file must reside within the same Web site. 如需部署和安全性目的，強烈建議您將檔案放在相同的 Web 應用程式中。For deployment and security purposes, it is strongly recommended that you place the file in the same Web application. 它是只能夠存取應用程式是否充分信任位於不同的應用程式相同的站台上的 XML 檔案。It is only possible to access an XML file that is located in a different application on the same site if the application has sufficient trust. 您可以為這個屬性設為絕對路徑或相對於 XML 檔案的路徑。You can set this property to either an absolute path or a path relative to the XML file. 您可以使用相對路徑來簡化部署。Use a relative path to simplify deployment. 如果您使用相對路徑，該路徑會相對於包含網頁或使用者控制項的位置控制項。If you use a relative path, that path is relative to the location of the page or user control that contains the control. 屬性是選擇性的。The property is optional. 公告也可以以程式設計方式設定事件。An advertisement can also be programmatically set in the event. XML 檔案包含下列預先定義的屬性。The XML file contains the following predefined attributes. 只有`ImageUrl`是必要的屬性。Only the `ImageUrl` attribute is required. |屬性Attribute|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|要顯示的映像 URL。The URL of the image to display.| |`Height`|映像，單位為像素 （選擇性） 的高度。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|映像，單位為像素 （選擇性） 的寬度。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|要巡覽至頁面的 URL按一下控制項時。The URL of the page to navigate to when the control is clicked.| |`AlternateText`|要顯示的映像無法使用時的文字。The text to display if the image is unavailable. 在某些瀏覽器中，此文字會顯示為工具提示。On some browsers, this text is displayed as a ToolTip.| |`Keyword`|分類廣告。The category for the advertisement. 這由控制項來篩選的特定類別的公告清單。This is used by the control to filter the list of advertisements for a specific category.| |`Impressions`|值，指出相對於其他 XML 檔案中的廣告顯示廣告的頻率。A value that indicates how often an advertisement is displayed in relation to other advertisements in the XML file.| > [!NOTE] > `ImageUrl`和`NavigateUrl`屬性可以是完整的 URL、 根目錄的相對路徑或相對路徑。The `ImageUrl` and `NavigateUrl` attributes can be a full URL, a root-relative path, or a relative path. 如果您使用根目錄的相對路徑，路徑會相對於相同的網站。If you use a root-relative path, the path is relative to the same Web site. 如果您使用相對路徑，路徑是相對於包含廣告檔案的目錄。If you use a relative path, the path is relative to the directory that contains the advertisement file. 您也可以使用 XML 檔案中的自訂標籤，以包含自訂屬性。You can also include custom attributes by using custom tags in the XML file. 所有屬性標記會被都剖析從廣告檔案，而值會放在字典。All attribute tags are parsed from the advertisement file, and the values are placed in the dictionary. 您可以使用以程式設計方式存取您的自訂屬性的字典。You can use the dictionary to programmatically access your custom attributes. 此檔案中的資訊不會驗證控制項。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 廣告可以防止執行惡意指令碼，您應該一律釋放，之前，先檢查資料，或接受來自信任來源的廣告資訊。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保護您免於未經授權的網際網路存取的通告檔案，執行一或多個項目：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 請將它儲存在資料目錄中，會拒絕任何類型的檔案的網際網路存取的 Machine.config 中進行設定。Store it in the Data directory, which is configured in Machine.config to deny Internet access for files of any type. - 重新命名此檔案不是.xml 副檔名，並將對應至延伸模組`HttpForbiddenHandler`Web.config 中。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Machine.config 檔案中的區段。Rename the file with an extension that is not .xml, and map the extension to `HttpForbiddenHandler` in Web.config. For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定包含廣告資訊的 XML 檔案的位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the XML file that contains advertisement information. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示 XML 廣告檔的檔案格式。The following code example shows the file format of the XML advertisement file. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateTextField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlternateTextField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂資料欄位，以便取代廣告的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom data field to use in place of the attribute for an advertisement.

value.span: 名稱，可識別存放廣告替代文字的欄位。

span.span: The name that identifies the field where the alternate text for an advertisement is stored.
The default value is "AlternateText."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來選取 自訂資料欄位，用來取代`AlternateText`廣告屬性。The property is used to select a custom data field to use in place of the `AlternateText` attribute for an advertisement. 例如`AlternateText`，此自訂的欄位定義含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔案中。Like `AlternateText`, this custom field is defined in the XML file that contains advertisement information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂資料欄位。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify a custom data field. ， ，並屬性用來以動態方式選取自訂的欄位，以用來取代`NavigateUrl`， `ImageUrl`，和`AlternateText`屬性。The , , and properties are used to dynamically select a custom field to use in place of the `NavigateUrl`, `ImageUrl`, and `AlternateText` attributes. 此範例會使用裝置篩選條件，以代表自訂欄位應該用於啟用無線應用通訊協定 WAP 的裝置。This example uses a device filter to indicate that custom fields should be used for Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)-enabled devices. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例 XML 資料，如先前的範例。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

value.span: 名稱，可識別為廣告顯示影像之 URL 的欄位。

span.span: The name that identifies the field where the URL for the image displayed for an advertisement is stored.
The default value is "ImageUrl."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來選取自訂資料欄位，用來取代`ImageUrl`廣告屬性。The property is used for selecting a custom data field used in place of the `ImageUrl` attribute for an advertisement. 例如`ImageUrl`，此自訂的欄位定義含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔案中。Like `ImageUrl`, this custom field is defined in the XML file that contains advertisement information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂資料欄位。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify a custom data field. ， ，並屬性用來以動態方式選取自訂的欄位，以用來取代`NavigateUrl`， `ImageUrl`，和`AlternateText`屬性。The , , and properties are used to dynamically select a custom field to use in place of the `NavigateUrl`, `ImageUrl`, and `AlternateText` attributes. 此範例會使用裝置篩選條件，以代表自訂欄位應該用於啟用無線應用通訊協定 WAP 的裝置。This example uses a device filter to indicate that custom fields should be used for Wireless Application Protocol (WAP)-enabled devices. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例 XML 資料，如先前的範例。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeywordFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeywordFilter : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定分類關鍵字，以篩選 XML 廣告檔中特定類型的廣告。

span.span: Gets or sets a category keyword to filter for specific types of advertisements in the XML advertisement file.

value.span: 要篩選 XML 廣告檔中特定類型廣告的關鍵字。

span.span: The keyword to filter for specific types of advertisements in the XML advertisement file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 廣告檔中的每個廣告可以指派的分類關鍵字。Each advertisement in the XML advertisement file can be assigned a category keyword. 使用来篩選的指定關鍵字的廣告屬性。Use the property to filter the advertisements for the specified keyword. 系統會為選取只包含關鍵字的公告控制項。Only advertisements containing the keyword will be selected for the control. 屬性可以透過程式設計方式設定為符合使用者的設定檔。The property can be programmatically set to match the profile of the user. 屬性是非常簡單的篩選搜尋指定的關鍵字。The property is a very simple filter that searches for the specified keyword. 不能指定多個關鍵字屬性，也不可以宣告廣告檔中的多個關鍵字。It is not possible to specify more than one keyword in the property, nor is it possible to declare multiple keywords in the advertisement file. > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設定這個屬性，才能發生效用。The property needs to be set for this property to have any effect. > [!CAUTION] > XML 廣告檔中找不到指定的關鍵字，如果沒有公告會顯示在控制項。If the specified keyword is not found in the XML advertisement file, no advertisement is displayed in the control. 請務必使用廣告檔中至少一個相符項目指定這個屬性的關鍵字。Be sure to specify a keyword for this property with at least one match in the advertisement file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用来篩選的遊戲相關的廣告屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to filter for game-related advertisements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.KeywordFilter Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定 XML 廣告檔中的每個廣告的關鍵字。The following code example demonstrates how to specify a keyword for each advertisement in the XML advertisement file. 如需有關檔案格式的詳細資訊，請參閱成員。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Business This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Games This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.MobileExamples/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例 XML 資料，如先前的範例。The following is the sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ~/Images/ad1.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com/vbasic/ Visual Basic Developer Site 140 100 ~/Images/mobileAd1.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobile/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ~/Images/ad2.gif http://msdn.microsoft.com MSDN 150 150 ~/Images/mobileAd2.jpg http://msdn.microsoft.com/mobility/ Windows Mobile Developer Site ```

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發之後在伺服器上建立控制項時，但在呈現頁面之前。The event is raised on the server after the control is created, but before the page is rendered. 如果設定屬性，則已選取公告之後，會引發事件控制項。If the property is set, the event is raised after an advertisement has been selected by the control. 引發事件，會叫用事件處理方法，透過委派。Raising an event invokes the event-handling method through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取得與公告相關聯的 URL 時控制項建立並將它顯示在控制項下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control is created and displays it below the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔案的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information on the XML file, see the property. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: Gets the HTML tag for the control.

value.span: 列舉值，表示 控制項的 HTML 標記。

span.span: An enumeration value representing the HTML tag for an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control developers. 使用屬性來判斷相關聯的值控制項。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 此屬性會覆寫基底實作一定會傳回。This property overrides the base implementation to always return .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定瀏覽器視窗或框架 (Frame) 的名稱，此視窗或框架會顯示當按一下 控制項時，Web 網頁所連結的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 瀏覽器視窗或框架，顯示當按一下 控制項時，Web 網頁所連結的內容。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的目標視窗或框架會顯示網頁的內容連結時按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute . `target`錨點屬性 (`a`) XHTML 1.1 中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on anchor (`a`) elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈現的標記必須符合 XHTML 標準，或必須符合協助工具標準，請勿設定屬性。Therefore, if rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)並[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 值必須以內範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其開頭為底線的字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 5.0 或更新版本支援`_search`目標值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 or later supports the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 它會顯示連結的網頁時的內容unframed 新視窗中按一下控制項時。It displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範含有廣告資訊的 XML 檔案的檔案格式。The following code example demonstrates the file format for an XML file that contains advertisement information. 如需有關檔案格式的詳細資訊，請參閱成員。For more information on the file format, see the member. ``` ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項唯一且符合階層架構的識別項。

span.span: Gets the unique, hierarchically qualified identifier for the control.

value.span: 伺服器控制項的完整識別項。

span.span: The fully qualified identifier for the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性與不同中，屬性屬性包含伺服器控制項的命名容器的識別碼。This property differs from the property in that the property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container. 處理網頁要求時，會自動產生這個識別碼。This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed.
